MajorClaims.MC1: both of studying hard and playing sports are part of life to children
MajorClaims.MC2: both studying hard at school and playing sports can improve children's future

Claims.C1: studying hard will give children a better future
Claims.C2: playing sports will give good effects on children

Premises.P1: Studying hard gives children with a plenty of knowledge and skills for their future
Premises.P2: children who always studying hard and getting high achievement, it will be easy to pass qualification for work and they are more likely to find great work at multinational company
Premises.P3: If they working at multinational company as the result is they can earn higher salary
Premises.P4: when you always studying harder than others you will get best results
Premises.P5: there are many benefit when children doing sport
Premises.P6: children who always playing sport like football, they will be active as a person and learn to become team-player
Premises.P7: It will be good for children
Premises.P8: indirectly they will learn how to socialize each other as a team
Premises.P9: That will make children getting lots of friends
Premises.P10: they can contribute positively to community
Premises.P11: playing sport makes children getting healthy and become children's well-being
